title: A novel deep intronic variant introduce dystrophin pseudoexon in Becker muscular dystrophy: A case report
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Chang Liu, Yanyu Lu, Haiyan Yu, Zhihao Xie, Chengyue Sun, Xinchao Cheng, Fangfang Niu, Yawen Zhao, Jianwen Deng, Lingchao Meng, Zhaoxia Wang, Yun Yuan, Zhiying Xie
